title: How to have calls and alarms on my pixel 3a appear full screen? They only appear as a notification.
content:
Hello,
Normally, when I receive a phone call (on whatsapp or regular phone), a full screen would pop up and interrupt everything I am doing. Same with alarm clocks: a full-screen would pop up showing the alarm and asking me to "snooze" or "dismiss".
However, since I switched to a new phone (from pixel 2 to 3a) I now only have a small notification pop up among all notifications, and I have to scroll through them to find the alarm clock and/or to respond to phone calls. It's super annoying.

Could anyone help me please?
Thanks!
